info.title: What information would you like to find out?
info.new_credit: New credit? Find out if you're eligible

who_checked.no_checks_message: The inquiry list is empty. We will notify you when new checks appear.
who_checked.app_satisfied_overall: How satisfied are you with the MyInfoDebit app overall?

success.title: Congratulations!
success.message: According to Infodebit data, you have a good chance of getting a loan. To find out more details about your credit history, order the Report now

fail.title: Oh no!
fail.message: According to Infodebit data, you have zero chance of getting a loan. To find out the reason, check your credit history report now

credit_scoring.grown: Don't be discouraged, any score can be improved!
credit_scoring.medium: No matter how slow you go, don't stop!
credit_scoring.fair: Trust yourself and you'll be unstoppable.
credit_scoring.lucky: You are capable of extraordinary things.
credit_scoring.best: Congratulations, you're an example worth following!
